about_the_game:
The new Lovely Knights Character Assets Pack comes with two strong and expertly crafted heroines that are ready to take over the mainstage of your next epic RPG.

The Lovely Knights Character Assets Pack features two unique heroines with sprites, faces, and bust images that all express actions and emotions in lovely detail. Prepare to use the sprite of each character for actions such as sitting, sleeping, and walking, along with the emotions for all those happy, shocking, and scary moments in your game - plus so much more!

The larger bust or near full body images are also perfect for those always important storytelling scenes in your game where you want to get up close with your hero and in more detail. With 39 expressions for each knight, you’ll be able to add images for your story that represent emotions and states such as blushing, injured, angry, awkward, grinning, sad, and more! Need a strong female knight for your next RPG? Here are two lovely options.

Features:

* Each of the 2 female knights characters comes with:
* 5 sheets of face-set with 39 expressions (Normal, Blush, Injured...)
* 15 Walking Sprite Sheets with different emotion expressions
* 1 Sitting Sprite Sheet
* 1 Sleeping Sprite Sheet
* 39 bust-up images with different expressions (Bonus: HD version!)

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
